name: Quarantine
description:
The gravity of isolation crafts history
out of scars, using minds as its pages.
Dreams that used to be portals are
now confined to ordinary rituals and
vague longings. Does the quest for
truth get louder as our worlds become
smaller and the self is immersed into
silence? Light is only meant to come
back when we remember what
freedom feels like. Written by
Rebellicca / For Archan Nair's
'Quarantine' / 9th November 2021
